CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant is a veteran of World War II . Under domestic law the ORG must subsidise his car ’s running costs . Not having received the subsidy in CARDINAL , the applicant applied to a court .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG of GPE awarded the applicant MONEY against a regional authority . On DATE the judgment became binding , and on CARDINAL DATE it was enforced .
CARDINAL . Under LAW of DATE , a judgment must be enforced within DATE .
